content:
Spring cleaning is just around the corner! I'd be happy to help you find some great deals on cleaning supplies at Target and Walgreens.

**Target Deals:**

1. **Up & Up Cleaning Supplies:** Target's in-house brand, Up & Up, offers affordable and effective cleaning products. You can find a variety of cleaning essentials like all-purpose cleaners, glass cleaners, and paper products at a lower price point than name-brand options.
2. **Cartwheel Offers:** Check the Target app for Cartwheel offers, which can give you 5-50% off select cleaning supplies. You can also browse the "Deals" section on the app to find discounts on cleaning products.
3. **Buy One Get One 50% Off (BOGO 50%):** Keep an eye out for BOGO 50% deals on cleaning supplies, which can help you stock up and save.
4. **Target RedCard:** If you have a Target RedCard, you'll get 5% off all purchases, including cleaning supplies.

**Walgreens Deals:**

1. **Buy One Get One Free (BOGO):** Walgreens often runs BOGO deals on cleaning supplies, so be sure to check their weekly ad or app for current offers.
2. **Digital Coupons:** Clip digital coupons on the Walgreens app or website to save on cleaning supplies. You can also earn points through their Balance Rewards program.
3. **Sales and Discounts:** Keep an eye on Walgreens' weekly sales and discounts on cleaning products, which can be found in their ad or on their website.
4. **Walgreens Brand:** Walgreens' store brand, Nice!, offers affordable cleaning products that are often cheaper than name-brand options.

**Additional Tips:**

* Stock up on essentials like paper products, trash bags, and cleaning supplies when they're on sale to avoid last-minute, full-price purchases.
* Consider buying in bulk if you have the storage space and use the products regularly.
* Don't forget to check for manufacturer's coupons, which can be combined with store sales and discounts for even greater savings.

I'm glad to hear you're enjoying the benefits of your Amazon Prime membership! The shipping savings can really add up over time.

Happy spring cleaning, and I hope you find some great deals on cleaning supplies!
